content: for help and community join our free fb group 1 **the west cropped cardigan** **difficulty** beginner **materials** kartopu yarn 80% acrylic 20% wool 100gr 170m 2 skeins in color k1854 pumpkin and a small amount in color light blue hook us size h-8 5 mm yarn needle scissors measuring tape **gauge** 13 st x 3 5 row **sizes** can be modified as you wish this sample is 18 in height x 20 width size m/l **notes** the pattern is worked in row chain 4 does count as st at the beginning of each row this pattern uses pattern repeats this pattern is worked in 3 panels joined together- two front panels and one back panel you can work this pattern with one color or multiple as you wish- i used one color for the cardigan and an accent color for buttons and stripes you can decide on the width and length of the cardigan by adding chains and row this pattern calls for multiples of 3+2 stay calm and crochet sandra 1 https //www facebook com/groups/1485811495102299
